name: Prime Minister's Scholarship Scheme (PMSS)
description: Scholarship for wards of ex-servicemen and ex-coast guard personnel pursuing professional courses in engineering, medicine, and management.
eligibility_text: Ward of ex-servicemen/ex-coast guard personnel. Minimum 60% in qualifying exam. Age below 25 years.

name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students
description: Merit-based scholarship for students from economically weaker sections pursuing graduation and post-graduation.
eligibility_text: Must be among top 20 percentile of Class 12 board. Family income below ₹8 lakh per annum.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for SC Students
description: Financial assistance to SC students studying in Class 9 and 10 to prevent dropouts.
eligibility_text: SC category student. Studying in Class 9 or 10. Family income below ₹2.5 lakh.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship for SC Students
description: Comprehensive scholarship covering tuition fees and maintenance allowance for SC students in higher education.
eligibility_text: SC category. Pursuing post-matric education. Family income below ₹2.5 lakh per annum.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for ST Students
description: Scholarship for ST students in Class 9-10 to support education and reduce dropout rates.
eligibility_text: ST category student. Class 9 or 10. Family income below ₹2 lakh.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship for ST Students
description: Financial support for ST students pursuing higher education beyond Class 10.
eligibility_text: ST category. Post-matric student. Family income below ₹2.5 lakh.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for OBC Students
description: Scholarship for OBC students in Classes 1-10 to promote education.
eligibility_text: OBC category. School student. Family income below ₹2.5 lakh.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship for OBC Students
description: Support for OBC students in higher education covering fees and maintenance.
eligibility_text: OBC category. Higher education student. Family income below ₹3 lakh.

name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMS)
description: Scholarship for meritorious students from economically weaker sections to reduce dropout at Class 8.
eligibility_text: Class 7 student moving to Class 8. Government school. At least 55% marks. Family income below ₹3.5 lakh.

name: INSPIRE Scholarship (SHE)
description: Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research. Scholarship for top science students.
eligibility_text: Top 1% in Class 12 board exam OR JEE/NEET qualified. Natural sciences stream only.

name: Prime Minister's Special Scholarship for J&K and Ladakh
description: Special scholarship for students from J&K and Ladakh pursuing undergraduate studies outside.
eligibility_text: Domicile of J&K or Ladakh. Pursuing approved courses outside home state.

name: Ishan Uday Scholarship for North Eastern Region
description: Scholarship for students from North Eastern states pursuing higher education.
eligibility_text: Permanent resident of NE state. Family income below ₹4.5 lakh.

name: National Scholarship for Persons with Disabilities
description: Scholarship for students with disabilities pursuing various levels of education.
provider: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
eligibility_text: Person with minimum 40% disability. Pursuing recognized course.

name: Begum Hazrat Mahal National Scholarship
description: Scholarship for meritorious girls from minority communities in Class 9-12.
eligibility_text: Girl student from minority community. Class 9-12. At least 50% marks. Family income below ₹2 lakh.

name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girls
description: Scholarship for girl students in AICTE approved technical education institutions.
eligibility_text: Girl student in AICTE approved technical course. First or second year. Family income below ₹8 lakh.

name: AICTE Saksham Scholarship
description: Scholarship for specially-abled students pursuing technical education.
eligibility_text: Differently-abled student (40%+ disability). AICTE approved technical course.

name: National Fellowship for SC Students
description: Fellowship for SC students pursuing M.Phil and PhD in Indian universities.
eligibility_text: SC category. Admitted to M.Phil/PhD in Indian university. Family income below ₹6 lakh.

name: National Fellowship for ST Students
description: Fellowship for ST students pursuing M.Phil and PhD in recognized universities.
eligibility_text: ST category. Pursuing M.Phil/PhD. Family income below ₹6 lakh.

name: Maulana Azad National Fellowship for Minority Students
description: Fellowship for students from minority communities pursuing M.Phil/PhD.
eligibility_text: Minority community. NET-JRF qualified. Family income below ₹6 lakh.

name: Swami Vivekananda Single Girl Child Scholarship
description: Scholarship for single girl child pursuing non-professional PG courses.
eligibility_text: Single girl child. Pursuing PG in social sciences, arts, humanities. Age below 30.

name: Dr. Ambedkar Post-Matric Scholarship - Maharashtra
description: Post-matric scholarship for SC/NB students in Maharashtra pursuing higher education.
eligibility_text: SC/NB category. Maharashtra domicile. Post-matric student.

name: Mukhyamantri Medhavi Vidyarthi Yojana - Madhya Pradesh
description: Flagship scholarship for meritorious students from MP covering full tuition fees.
eligibility_text: MP domicile. 70%+ in Class 12 (MPBSE) or 85%+ (CBSE/ICSE). Family income below ₹6 lakh.

name: Pratibha Kiran Scholarship - Madhya Pradesh
description: Scholarship for BPL girls from urban areas pursuing higher education.
eligibility_text: Girl student from urban BPL family. 60%+ in Class 12. MP domicile.

name: Oasis Scholarship - West Bengal
description: Umbrella scholarship scheme for SC/ST/OBC students in West Bengal.
eligibility_text: SC/ST/OBC category. West Bengal domicile.

name: Kanyashree Prakalpa - West Bengal
description: Conditional cash transfer for girl students to prevent child marriage.
eligibility_text: Unmarried girl aged 13-18. Family income below ₹1.2 lakh.

name: Post-Matric Scholarship - Karnataka
description: Post-matric scholarship for backward class students in Karnataka.
eligibility_text: SC/ST/OBC category. Karnataka domicile.

name: Vidyasiri Scholarship - Karnataka
description: Merit-cum-means scholarship for economically weaker sections.
eligibility_text: Karnataka domicile. 60%+ in qualifying exam. Family income below ₹3.5 lakh.

name: Mukhyamantri Kanya Utthan Yojana - Bihar
description: Comprehensive scheme for girl education from birth to graduation in Bihar.
eligibility_text: Girl student from Bihar. Various stages from Class 12 pass to graduation.

name: Chief Minister's Scholarship - Rajasthan
description: Merit scholarship for students from government schools in Rajasthan.
eligibility_text: Government school student. 60%+ in Class 12. Rajasthan domicile.

name: Uttarakhand State Merit Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarship for bright students from Uttarakhand.
eligibility_text: Uttarakhand domicile. 75%+ marks.

name: Gujarat SC Scholarship
description: Post-matric scholarship for SC students in Gujarat.
eligibility_text: SC category. Gujarat domicile. Post-matric student.

name: TS ePASS Scholarship - Telangana
description: Electronic Payment and Application System for SC/ST/BC students.
eligibility_text: SC/ST/BC category. Telangana domicile. Family income below ₹2 lakh.

name: Tata Trusts Scholarship
description: Need-based scholarship for students from economically disadvantaged backgrounds.
eligibility_text: Financial need demonstrated. Merit in academics. Good conduct.

name: Reliance Foundation Scholarship
description: Scholarship for meritorious students pursuing undergraduate education.
eligibility_text: Indian citizen. First year undergraduate. Family income below ₹15 lakh.

name: Kotak Kanya Scholarship
description: Scholarship for meritorious girl students from underprivileged families.
eligibility_text: Girl student. 85%+ in Class 12. Family income below ₹3 lakh. Professional course.

name: HDFC Bank Parivartan ECSS
description: Educational Crisis Scholarship Support for students facing financial difficulties.
eligibility_text: Financial crisis situation. 55%+ marks. Family income below ₹6 lakh.

name: L&T Build India Scholarship
description: Scholarship for engineering students in civil, mechanical, or electrical engineering.
eligibility_text: Engineering student in civil/mechanical/electrical. Family income below ₹4 lakh. AICTE college.

name: Sitaram Jindal Foundation Scholarship
description: Merit-cum-means scholarship for students pursuing various degree programs.
eligibility_text: Indian citizen. 60%+ marks. Family income below ₹2 lakh.

name: Mahindra All India Talent Scholarship
description: Scholarship for diploma students in automobile/mechanical/electrical engineering.
eligibility_text: Diploma in automobile/mechanical/electrical. Family income below ₹2.5 lakh.

name: Infosys Foundation Scholarship
description: Support for students from underserved communities in science and technology.
eligibility_text: Science/technology stream. Demonstrated financial need. Good academic record.

name: Azim Premji Foundation Scholarship
description: Scholarship for students pursuing teacher education programs.
eligibility_text: Pursuing B.Ed/M.Ed or education-related degree. Commitment to teaching career.

name: Bharti Foundation Satya Bharti Scholarship
description: Quality education scholarship for rural students pursuing undergraduate studies.
eligibility_text: Rural student. First generation learner preferred. Family income below ₹3 lakh.

name: Aditya Birla Scholarship
description: Scholarship for outstanding students from premier institutions.
eligibility_text: Student of IIT/IIM/BITS/XLRI/law schools. Academic excellence plus extracurriculars.

name: Google Generation Scholarship
description: Scholarship for students excelling in technology and computer science.
eligibility_text: CS or related field. Strong academic record. Community involvement.

name: Wipro E-Apply Scholarship
description: Scholarship for engineering students from economically disadvantaged backgrounds.
eligibility_text: Engineering student. 60%+ marks. Family income below ₹5 lakh.

name: Fair and Lovely Foundation Scholarship
description: Scholarship empowering women through education.
eligibility_text: Women pursuing higher education. Family income below ₹6 lakh. 60%+ marks.

name: IIT Merit-cum-Means Scholarship
description: Need-based scholarship for undergraduate students at all IITs.
eligibility_text: IIT student. Family income below ₹9 lakh. Good academic standing.

name: BITS Pilani Merit Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarship at BITS Pilani covering partial tuition fees.
eligibility_text: BITS admission. Top academic performance each semester.

name: NIT Need-Based Support
description: Financial assistance for economically disadvantaged students at NITs.
eligibility_text: NIT student. Family income below ₹5 lakh.

name: Delhi University Merit Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarship for top performers at Delhi University colleges.
eligibility_text: DU student. Top 10% in class. Regular attendance.

eligibility_text: Category: General. Domicile of Assam, Odisha. Family annual income below ₹400,000. Minimum 60% marks in qualifying examination. Pursuing School studies.
